title: Update landing page to simplified rate list + UPI payment layout (English text) with subtle UPI fade-in

requirements.text: Refactor `frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx` to match the structure and styling of the user-provided HTML snippet: a minimal single-page layout containing (1) a sticky top navigation bar with logo + brand text and a call button, (2) a two-card services rate list section (Cleaning and AC Service), (3) a centered UPI payment section with QR code + UPI ID + service area caption, and (4) a simple footer. Remove or hide the existing extra marketing sections (hero, estimator, booking form, maps, testimonials, floating WhatsApp button, etc.) so the page renders primarily the new simplified layout.

quotes: <nav class="bg-white shadow-lg sticky top-0 z-50 p-4">
Pay Online via UPI

acceptanceCriteria: The landing page renders only the sections represented in the provided snippet: navbar, rate list, UPI payment, footer (no large hero/estimator/maps/testimonials/booking sections).
Navbar remains sticky (`sticky top-0 z-50`) with a tel: link using `+918000262644` and visible label `80002 62644`.
The rate list shows two cards (Cleaning and AC Service) with the exact line items and prices shown in the snippet.
The UPI section shows the QR image and UPI ID exactly as in the snippet (including the UPI ID `jrg7311@okicici`).
The footer displays the copyright text for 2026 as in the snippet.

requirements.text: Convert all non-English user-facing strings in the provided snippet to English in the updated React page (keep all phone number, UPI ID, and pricing values unchanged). Specifically replace the Gujarati heading/subheading in the rate list section with clear English equivalents.

quotes: અમારી ખાસ સેવાઓ અને રેટ લિસ્ટ
અમદાવાદ અને ગાંધીનગરમાં સૌથી વ્યાજબી ભાવ

acceptanceCriteria: No Gujarati (or other non-English) text is visible on the landing page after the update.
The rate list section heading/subheading are in English and communicate the same meaning (services + rate list; affordable pricing in Ahmedabad & Gandhinagar).

requirements.text: Implement a subtle soft fade-in animation for the UPI payment box (the card that contains the QR code and UPI ID). The animation should trigger on initial render (or when the section scrolls into view) and must not rely on external libraries not already present in the project.

quotes: want to add a soft fade‑in on the UPI payment box for a bit more polish?

acceptanceCriteria: The UPI payment card visibly fades in (opacity/translate) in a subtle way without jarring motion.
Animation does not break layout and remains accessible (no essential information hidden permanently).

requirements.text: Avoid Font Awesome `<i class="fas ...">` usage from the snippet in the React implementation; use existing icon tooling already in the codebase (e.g., `lucide-react` Phone icon) while keeping the visual intent of a phone icon next to the call-to-action.
acceptanceCriteria: No Font Awesome dependency is introduced and no `<i class="fas ...">` remains in the React code.
The call button still includes a phone icon and the phone number label.

requirements.text: Preserve the user-provided external asset URLs exactly where used in the snippet, including the logo URL `https://magical-sofa-cleaning-7pe.caffeine.xyz/logo.png` and the QR generator URL `https://api.qrserver.com/v1/create-qr-code/?size=180x180&data=upi://pay?pa=jrg7311@okicici&pn=Magical%20Service&cu=INR`. Ensure the logo has a working fallback behavior in React when the logo fails to load (fallback to `https://img.icons8.com/color/96/000000/cleaning-service.png`).
acceptanceCriteria: The page uses the QR URL with `size=180x180` exactly as provided.
If the logo URL fails, the logo displays the icons8 fallback image.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, and anything under `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Backend must remain single-actor architecture; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not add or change Internet Identity authentication behavior.
Do not add new booking flows, WhatsApp redirects, Google Maps embeds, testimonials, or AI price estimator features beyond what is necessary to match the provided simplified snippet.
Do not introduce new icon libraries (e.g., Font Awesome).
